summary: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?
cast: Keira Knightley|Talulah Riley|Rosamund Pike|Jena Malone|Carey Mulligan|Donald Sutherland|Brenda Blethyn|Claudie Blakley|Sylvester Morand|Simon Woods|Kelly Reilly|Matthew Macfadyen|Pip Torrens|Janet Whiteside|Sinead Matthews|Roy Holder|Rupert Friend|Tom Hollander|Jay Simpson|Judi Dench|Rosamund Stephen|Samantha Bloom|Cornelius Booth|Penelope Wilton|Peter Wight|Meg Wynn Owen|Tamzin Merchant|Moya Brady|Mark Arends|Billy Burke|Kate Copeland|Stephen Humby|Bret Jones|Arnold Montey|Liam Thomas
title: Pride & Prejudice (Orgullo y prejuicio)
